content.en: Precision in cancer testing: Researchers from the American Society of Clinical Oncology and College of American Pathologists are investigating how to improve the accuracy of testing for estrogen and progesterone receptors in breast cancer, as well as the accuracy and standardization of HER2 testing. They are also exploring the prognostic significance of moderate expression of HER2 without gene amplification in early breast cancer. The researchers are using algorithms to aid in their investigations, but the specific algorithms being used are not specified.
content.da: Præcision i kræfttestning: Forskere fra American Society of Clinical Oncology og College of American Pathologists undersøger, hvordan man kan forbedre nøjagtigheden af testning for østrogen- og progesteronreceptorer i brystkræft, samt nøjagtigheden og standardiseringen af HER2-testning. De undersøger også den prognostiske betydning af moderat udtryk af HER2 uden genamplifikation i tidlig brystkræft. Forskerne anvender algoritmer til at hjælpe i deres undersøgelser, men de specifikke algoritmer, der anvendes, er ikke angivet.
